channel.title: Snubs
channel.description: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

item.title: Contagion
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Steven Soderbergh’s Contagion, and the 2012 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline and Chris both have LOTS of thoughts on Albert Nobbs. They also break down the current state of the Oscar race!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Barbie and Oppenheimer: The Double Feature That Could
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this special episode, our titular hosts recap the historic 2023 Barbenheimer weekend which saw the release of Greta Gerwig’s Barbie and Christopher Nolan’s Oppenheimer. They discuss how they scheduled their double features, and what they thought about both of these great films. In addition, they talk about the SAG and WGA strikes that are affecting all of Hollywood, and what that means for Movie and TV fans for the foreseeable future.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Dazed and Confused + 2023 Oscar Nominees Chat
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Richard Linklater’s Dazed and Confused and the 1994 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. But first, they will be discussing the 2023 Oscar nominations and some of the snubs and surprises that came with the list. It’s a great year in movies and there’s much to talk about after their brief hiatus. Caroline is Team Fabelmans and Team Colin Farrell all the way, and Chris has an unexpected favorite Linklater film.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

item.title: Halloween (+ Montclair Film Festival Recap)
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss John Carpenter’s Halloween and the 1979 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. But first, they will be joined by Ana Tressel to discuss their weekend at the Montclair Film Festival where they screened Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery, Armageddon Time, The Good Nurse, and The Whale. Caroline thought Michael Meyers was the same person as Mike Myers in her youth, Chris likes to set an atmospheric scene when talking about Halloween, and Ana shares her Daniel Craig/Knives Out impression with our audience.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

item.title: Emmys 2022 Recap
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, usually discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this special episode, our titular hosts recap the 2022 Emmys, and the surprise moments everyone can’t stop talking about. They also discuss some of the shows nominated, and which series and stars may have been snubbed this year. They recorded right after the show, so are both tired but excited to talk about one of their favorite events of the year. Chris could not be more happy for Michael Keaton, and Caroline believes Bill Hader was robbed.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: History of the World: Part I (+ Venice Film Festival Recap)
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Mel Brooks’ History of the World: Part I, and the 1982 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline absolutely roasts Chris for his movie choice, and Chris needs to do penance for throwing the pod off its rhythm.

item.title: Oscars 2022 Recap
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, are joined by special guest Ana Tressel to recap the 2022 Oscars and the slap everyone can’t stop talking about. They also discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Academy this year, and where they’d make some changes. Chris’s allergies make him sound like he’s been chain smoking for 80 years, Caroline can’t believe the 3 hour Japanese Best Picture nominee was watched without her, and Ana wants Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield to get back together.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
